item.title: The One Hundred Day GitHub Challenge
item.description: Hello folks. Today, I present to you the One Hundred Day Github Challenge. The rules are simple: Minimum of One commit every day for a Hundred days. Commit has to be meaningful but can be as little as a fix in a Readme.md. Doesn’t matter if you are on vacation, there are no exceptions. There. Are. No. Exceptions. If you fail a day, you have to start over. No cheating.
